segments.text: Wow ! That ’ s a pretty dress , but it ’ s too expensive .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , it is ! Why is it so expensive ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s because of good quality and the fine design .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don ’ t think it ’ s worth that money .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Anyhow , this dress is really elegant .
segments.speaker: S1
